edu.bu.hw3.nn

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bu.hw3.nn.Parameter

  • public class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains a Parameter Matrix in a Neural Network. A Parameter groups together the Matrix itself along with its gradient Matrix (which has the same dimensionality)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parameter(Matrix m)
      The constructor.

      • step

        public Parameter step(Matrix update)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        A method to update the value of this Parameter in the direction of the argument
        Parameters:
        update - The Matrix (typically computed from Parameter's gradient) used to update this Parameter's value
        Returns:
        this Parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • toStringData

        public java.lang.String toStringData()
        A method to write this Parameter's value in a (non-human-readable) String representation. This representation is used when saving this Parameter to a file, and is much easier to parse than the human-readable String rep.
        Returns:
        The non-human-readable but much easier to parse String representation of this Parameter.

      • loadStringData

        public void loadStringData(java.lang.String data)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        A method to parse a non-human-readable (i.e. the output of Parameter.toStringData()) String representation and overwrite the current Parameter's value with the parsed entries. This calls Matrix.loadStringData()
        Parameters:
        data - The non-human-readable (i.e. the output of Matrix.toStringData()) String representation of a Parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
